data.description: Fluid is an app that turns your mixed reality headset into a personal spatial computer. Apps and webpages can be placed anywhere around you in 3D space, and you can change your workspace between a virtual room and a mixed-reality experience. Fluid is great for casual web browsing, and its even better for students and professionals looking to achieve and maintain a deep flow state for focus, attention, productivity while they work.

changelog.change_log:
Hey @everyone we are pushing this update a bit early because we introduced a bad bug earlier that could sometimes breaks physical keyboard support. This update should hopefully fix it, but it's in a rougher state than normal. We'll fix the issues early next week and push a patch. In the meantime...

v0.20.15 (04/12/2024) 

## New Features
* Increase default zoom level/text size
* You can now purchase a pack of 5 additional skybox slots for $9.99. This is a way you can help support Fluid's development. 

## Bug Fixes
* (Hopefully) fixed keyboard input breaking when using physical keyboard. (Please let us know ASAP if you encounter a bug where it's repeatedly submitting things as if the Enter key is held down)
* Fixed bug where closing a window with content focused prevented keyboard input to URL bar in other windows until you click on a page. 
* Fixed charging icon colors

## Other Notes
* If you have https://discord.gg/fluidsim in your settings for favorites buttons, pelase replace it with this: "https://discord.com/channels/1106002752166965358/1106002753345552437"
Fixed volume bug and added Russian
